author: Ewan Palmer
title: 'It's Bats*** Crazy to Eat Bats': Bill Maher Blasts Critics Who Say 'Chinese Virus' is Wrong, Inaccurate
description: The host said it is not wrong to blame the pandemic on China as it has "everything to do with" them.
content:
Bill Mayer defended referring to COVID-19 as the "Chinese virus" as scientists have been naming diseases and other conditions after their country of origin for years.
Speaking during an episode of Real Time With Bill Maher, the host also dismissed suggestion… [+6192 chars]
